name: Red Hat Package Manager Source File
summary: Learn about .SRC.RPM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After installing SRC.RPM files on Red Hat Linux, they will be located in /​usr/​src/​.../​SPECS and /​usr/​src/​.../​SOURCES.
NOTE: Can be installed on any Linux system that is compatible with RPM files.

description: Source file referenced for installation of programs on Linux systems; similar to .RPM files but contains the compiled program and source code for the program, which can be modified; used to .
